title.rendered: How Can Bridge Career Help You?

content.rendered: ** Bridge Careers Travel Agencies, a Tulsa Medical Staffing and Tulsa Administrative Staffing company can help staff the Tulsa area At Bridge Careers Travel Agencies, we help connect exceptional talent with quality employers. 1.  Bridge Career helps to connect employers with exceptional talent. If you, as an office manager, are looking for a person with a specific set of skills or the perfect fit for your team, Bridge Career is the place for you.  We visit with you to get your desired skill set and then listen to what type of personality/fit you are looking for. We thoroughly screen candidates before sending them to you for an interview. Bridge Career conducts a detailed interview process, which can include job verification, background checks, drug screens, along with any other required pre-screening needs.  Let us take the headache of screening and interviewing the candidates for you, presenting you with the top choices for your position. 2.  Bridge Career helps job seekers to find a great company. In today’s economy, it is hard to find a company that values you as an employee.  If you are an employee seeking a career and a great job in the Tulsa area, you have the right place.  We meet with our employers and try to find the right fit for your personality and skillset.  Our goal is to find a job that will smoothly transition from temporary to permanent. Today staffing companies have matched millions of employees with new jobs.  Bridge Career offers jobs in medical and administrative professions.  Most positions are temporary, with the end goal to become permanent.  Bridge Career has relationships with many Tulsa area employers, giving you a foot in the door to these companies. 3. Bridge Career’s goal is to find a great fit between employer and employee and to help reduce the unemployment rate in Tulsa. To reach success, we strive to find a perfect fit between the employee and employer, transitioning the position into a permanent placement.  By taking the time to get to know both employee and employer, we have the knowledge to find that fit.  Bridge Career is not just for a placement and numbers, but to increase quality of life of the Tulsa area population.
